product_name: The James River Guide: Fishing and Floating on Virginia's Finest - 2nd Edition
long_description: The keys to enjoying the best the James River has to offer are revealed in this updated guide. Author: Bruce Ingram. Softcover; 136 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Ecopress; copyright 2007. Divided into 3 sections; Iron Gate to Snowden, Lynchburg to Scottsville and Scottsville to Maidens. Find the best smallmouth bass fishing in the state, along with muskies and flathead catfish. River runners find everything from placid slackwater to adventurous rapids throughout the river. Spring blossoms, fall color and the fascinating history of the Batteaux Era canals give the James a unique charm.
short_description: The keys to enjoying the best the James River has to offer are revealed in this updated guide.
